p.d: Setting off from the Provençal Colorado, Nans and Mouts head for the Austrian Alps to build an igloo and spend the night. With a camera-equipped backpack on their shoulders and a camera in their hands, they hitchhike across France, Switzerland and Austria, meeting plenty of unusual people. Directed by: Nans Thomassey, Guillaume Mouton, Charlene Gravel (season 4, France, 2016)
